description:
From exploring trails, to jumping in the lake, these quick-dry shorts are good to go. Just as delicious as their namesake (Good Ol’ Raisin and Peanuts), they pack down small and are work on any trail.

  • Nylon fabric dries quickly
  • DWR finish helps sheds dust, light rain and speeds dry time
  • UPF 30+ rated material stops more than 96% of UV
  • Deep front pockets have drainage ports
  • Elastic waistband with an internal drawcord
name: MEC Gorp Hike Shorts - Men's
